doc.field: RETINAL FLECKS IN STARGARDT DISEASE REVEAL CHARACTERISTIC FLUORESCENCE LIFETIME TRANSITION OVER TIME.,"In recent years, the incidence of tuberculosis, HIV, syphilis and other infectious diseases has a ""rising"" trend. The incidence of infectious fundus diseases is also increasing, and missed diagnosis and misdiagnosis are becoming more common. How to diagnose infectious fundus diseases accurately, avoid missed diagnosis and misdiagnosis, carry out standardized treatment in time, carry out research on infectious fundus diseases related to systemic infectious diseases, and save the visual function of patients are the problems we are facing. This article discusses the related issues. (Chin J Ophthalmol, 2019, 55: 241-245). "
